Package project.riskgame.com.controller

Class PlayerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • project.riskgame.com.controller.PlayerController
  • public class PlayerController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class gives information about the player and performs operations on each player
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Devdutt, Dhaval, Shubham, Kshitij, Sakshi

      • fortificationOfArmies

        public boolean fortificationOfArmies​(Player player,
                                     java.lang.String fromCountryName,
                                     java.lang.String toCountryName,
                                     int noOfArmies)
        This method will move armies between neighboring countries
        Parameters:
        player - player who wish to do fortification
        fromCountryName - from country name where armies are to be moved
        toCountryName - to country name where armies are to be added
        noOfArmies - no of armies to be moved
        Returns:
        true if fortification is successful else return false
